FuncDef:
The set patch cpu-usage command sets a patch CPU overload threshold.
The undo set patch cpu-usage command restores the default patch CPU overload threshold.

By default, the patch CPU overload threshold is 85.


The board configuration prevails if there is any.
CLIs: undo set patch cpu-usage threshold [ slot <slot-id> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a patch CPU overload threshold.
The value is an integer ranging from 70 to 100.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To set a patch CPU overload threshold, run the set patch cpu-usage command.
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
